document.full_text: zimbabwean president robert mugabe on sunday vowed his party would not back down from its controversial drive to force foreign-owned companies to sell majority shareholdings to local blacks.
document.title: mugabe says will not drop policy on foreign firms
lines_and_colors: zimbabwean president robert mugabe on sunday vowed his party would not back down from its controversial drive to force foreign-owned companies to sell majority shareholdings to local blacks.
